text:
The full press conference by Dr. Dan Erickson, an expert, on why we are totally overdoing our virus reaction, especially in CA, is AMAZING. 

I would contribute $10,000 if he challenged @GavinNewsom 

Bakersfield doctors dispute need for stay-at-home order https://t.co/9XE43apVpR
